pr_title: Add log of request to adapter by specified bidder

timeline.message:
Add log of request to adapter by specified bidder

It can be refactored after https://github.com/rubicon-project/prebid-server-java/pull/815 will be merged

Add log of request to adapter by specified bidder

It can be refactored after https://github.com/rubicon-project/prebid-server-java/pull/815 will be merged

timeline.bodyText: This argument should be called bidderRequests, now its name is deceiving. Later lambda parameter needs to be renamed too.
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText: impExt.set(bidder, impExtBidder) looks like a simpler way to achieve the same.
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText:
I suggest that we move this step to be right after
.map(bidderRequests -> updateRequestMetric(
                        bidderRequests, uidsCookie, aliases, publisherId, context.getRequestTypeMetric()))

because it will be clear there that this activity is outstanding and not related to making actual requests to bidders.
timeline.author: schernysh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -160,7 +164,8 @@ public ExchangeService(long expectedCacheTime,
                                 auctionTimeout(timeout, cacheInfo.isDoCaching()),
                                 debugEnabled,
                                 aliases))
-                        .collect(Collectors.toList())))
+                        .collect(Collectors.toList()))
+                        .map(compositeFuture -> maybeLogBidderInteraction(context, bidderRequests, compositeFuture)))

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'master' into add-bidder-request-log
